name: Elephant House Lemonade
description: Elephant House's take on an age-old summer tradition, this Lemonade is the quintessential refreshment to beat the heat. Complete with a tangy, lemony zing, Elephant House Lemonade is the cool, fizzy, and sparkly choice to re-energize your body, mind, and spirit, day or night.  *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
